column4: I am trying to mount a windows disc so I can retrieve the info off of it. I tried mkdir /mnt/win and I got the permission denied response.
hda1 is ide drive and sda1 is either usb drive or a scsi drive or SATA drive
chmod -R /media/win    What am I missing. It says I am missing an operand?
your missing the user that will own the directory
whatever your user is that you log on as
chown -R mitche /media/win but umask would be easier
by change what is your toher drive?
ok you trying to jsut read it right? or you want write support
ok you probably need to use umask then
Thanks..I will likely be back. Have patience with me.
before I do his will I have to unmount what I already did??
well I would just to start fresh
Ended up using that script. I guess I didn't learn much, but it worked. Thanks.
